mean_cn: n. 养老金；抚恤金；  v. 发给…养老金
mean_en: an amount of money that a company or the government pays to a person who is old or sick and no longer works
word_etyma: pens花费 + ion名词后缀 → 政府给老年人等花费的钱 → pension 养老金
short_phrase: The old man gets a pension.
sentence: After they retired, my grandparents received a pension every month.
sentence_trans: 退休之后，我爷爷奶奶每个月都能领到一笔养老金。
